skos:definition: Vocabulary for LLM Profiles structured data profiles

skos:hasTopConcept.skos:definition: A structured data profile for a specific content type
skos:hasTopConcept.skos:scopeNote: Profiles define constrained subsets of Schema.org for specific use cases

skos:hasTopConcept.skos:definition: JSON Schema for validating JSON-LD markup on web pages
skos:hasTopConcept.skos:scopeNote: Used in CI/CD to validate structured data before deployment

skos:hasTopConcept.skos:definition: JSON Schema for validating extracted content for RAG/AI applications
skos:hasTopConcept.skos:scopeNote: Normalizes data structure for machine learning pipelines

skos:hasTopConcept.skos:definition: Training data export format for LLM fine-tuning and RAG
skos:hasTopConcept.skos:scopeNote: Publisher-owned exports that mirror on-page semantics

skos:hasTopConcept.skos:definition: Example JSON-LD implementations for the profile
Recommended practices for implementing the profile
Anti-patterns to avoid when implementing the profile
Date when the profile was created

skos:note: This vocabulary defines terms used in LLM Profiles for structured data profiles that bridge SEO and AI applications.
skos:changeNote: Initial vocabulary definition for LLM Profiles v1.0.0
skos:editorialNote: Vocabulary maintained by the LLM Profiles community
skos:historyNote: Created as part of the LLM Profiles specification
